title: Korean Supernatural Action Movie 'Holy Night: Demon Hunters' Trailer
description: "Release her at once!" Capelight has revealed an official US trailer for a Korean supernatural action thriller movie titled Holy Night: Demon Hunters, hitting theaters to watch starting in May. The film is getting a worldwide release at the same time - in Korea on April 30th, US on May 2nd, and many other countries as well. Seoul descends into chaos as a devil-worshipping criminal network emerges... In a desperate plea for salvation, the police turn to a secret trio of demon hunters armed with supernatural powers – known as the "Holy Night". The three of them have supernatural powers which help them find and exorcise demons. Bau, Sharon, and Kim Gun sets out to eradicate the forces of darkness and save Seoul. The cast features Lee David as Kim Gun, Ma Dong-seok (aka Don Lee / known as Korea's Dwayne Johnson) as Bau, and Seo-hyun as Sharon; along with Kyung Soo-jin and Jung Ji-so. There's a lot of new films about supernatural problems coming out of South Korea recently. This might be cool to watch - I just wish it was a better trailer. Here's the official US trailer (+ posters) for Lim Dae-hee's Holy Night: Demon Hunters, from […]
author: Alex Billington
excerpt: "Release her at once!" Capelight has revealed an official US trailer for a Korean supernatural action thriller movie titled Holy Night: Demon Hunters, hitting theaters to watch starting in May. The film is getting a worldwide release at the same time - in Korea on April 30th, US on May 2nd, and many other countries
text: TRAILERS by April 27, 2025Source: YouTube "Release her at once!" Capelight has revealed an official US trailer for a Korean supernatural action thriller movie titled Holy Night: Demon Hunters, hitting theaters to watch starting in May. The film is getting a worldwide release at the same time - in Korea on April 30th, US on May 2nd, and many other countries as well. Seoul descends into chaos as a devil-worshipping criminal network emerges... In a desperate plea for salvation, the police turn to a secret trio of demon hunters armed with supernatural powers – known as the "Holy Night". The three of them have supernatural powers which help them find and exorcise demons. Bau, Sharon, and Kim Gun sets out to eradicate the forces of darkness and save Seoul. The cast features Lee David as Kim Gun, Ma Dong-seok (aka Don Lee / known as Korea's Dwayne Johnson) as Bau, and Seo-hyun as Sharon; along with Kyung Soo-jin and Jung Ji-so. There's a lot of new films about supernatural problems coming out of South Korea recently. This might be cool to watch - I just wish it was a better trailer. Here's the official US trailer (+ posters) for Lim Dae-hee's Holy Night: Demon Hunters, from YouTube: And two more original Korean trailers for Lim Dae-hee's Holy Night: Demon Hunters, from YouTube: "Salvation must be fought for..." Seoul descends into chaos when a devil-worshipping criminal network emerges. In a desperate plea for help, the police turn to 'Holy Night' - a secretive trio of demon hunters armed with supernatural powers. Don Lee leads a powerhouse with immense physical strength. He's joined by Sharon, who can detect & exorcise demons, and Kim-kun, their loyal support. When psychiatrist Jung-Won begs for help to save her possessed sister Eun-Seo, the team faces a terrifying force unlike any they've seen before. Holy Night: Demon Hunters, also known as 거룩한 밤: 데몬 헌터스 or Georokhan: Demun Heonteoseu in Korean, is directed by Korean filmmaker Lim Dae-hee, making his feature directorial debut with this. The screenplay is written by Ma Dong-seok & Lim Dae-hee. Produced by Bigpunch Entertaiment & Nova Film. The film opens first in South Korea starting on April 30th this spring. Capelight debuts Holy Night: Demon Hunters in select US theaters starting May 2nd, 2025 coming soon. Who wants to watch? Find more posts in: Foreign Films, To Watch, Trailer prev next
html:
TRAILERS

by
April 27, 2025
Source: YouTube

"Release her at once!" Capelight has revealed an official US trailer for a Korean supernatural action thriller movie titled Holy Night: Demon Hunters, hitting theaters to watch starting in May. The film is getting a worldwide release at the same time - in Korea on April 30th, US on May 2nd, and many other countries as well. Seoul descends into chaos as a devil-worshipping criminal network emerges... In a desperate plea for salvation, the police turn to a secret trio of demon hunters armed with supernatural powers – known as the "Holy Night". The three of them have supernatural powers which help them find and exorcise demons. Bau, Sharon, and Kim Gun sets out to eradicate the forces of darkness and save Seoul. The cast features Lee David as Kim Gun, Ma Dong-seok (aka Don Lee / known as Korea's Dwayne Johnson) as Bau, and Seo-hyun as Sharon; along with Kyung Soo-jin and Jung Ji-so. There's a lot of new films about supernatural problems coming out of South Korea recently. This might be cool to watch - I just wish it was a better trailer.

Here's the official US trailer (+ posters) for Lim Dae-hee's Holy Night: Demon Hunters, from YouTube:

And two more original Korean trailers for Lim Dae-hee's Holy Night: Demon Hunters, from YouTube:

"Salvation must be fought for..." Seoul descends into chaos when a devil-worshipping criminal network emerges. In a desperate plea for help, the police turn to 'Holy Night' - a secretive trio of demon hunters armed with supernatural powers. Don Lee leads a powerhouse with immense physical strength. He's joined by Sharon, who can detect & exorcise demons, and Kim-kun, their loyal support. When psychiatrist Jung-Won begs for help to save her possessed sister Eun-Seo, the team faces a terrifying force unlike any they've seen before. Holy Night: Demon Hunters, also known as 거룩한 밤: 데몬 헌터스 or Georokhan: Demun Heonteoseu in Korean, is directed by Korean filmmaker Lim Dae-hee, making his feature directorial debut with this. The screenplay is written by Ma Dong-seok & Lim Dae-hee. Produced by Bigpunch Entertaiment & Nova Film. The film opens first in South Korea starting on April 30th this spring. Capelight debuts Holy Night: Demon Hunters in select US theaters starting May 2nd, 2025 coming soon. Who wants to watch?

Find more posts in: Foreign Films, To Watch, Trailer
